name: teardown-intellisense
description: Adds intellisense for Teardown's scripting API using custom-made definitions based on the official Teardown modding documentation

TeardownIntellisense.enableIntellisense.title: Enable Intellisense
TeardownIntellisense.enableIntellisense.description: Enables the Teardown scripting API intellisense.

TeardownIntellisense.showPrompt.title: Show Prompt on First Detection
TeardownIntellisense.showPrompt.description: Show prompt to enable Teardown scripting API intellisense when info.txt is detected. (once per workspace)

TeardownIntellisense.teardownDirectory.title: Teardown Directory
TeardownIntellisense.teardownDirectory.description: Path to the Teardown installation directory.

TeardownIntellisense.additionalIncludePa.title: Additional Include Paths
TeardownIntellisense.additionalIncludePa.description: Additional file/folder paths to to search for API definitions relative to "<Teardown Directory>/data/".
